TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICustomTypeDescriptor

summary.span: 提供介面來提供物件的動態自訂型別資訊。

span.span: Provides an interface that supplies dynamic custom type information for an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面可讓物件，以提供有關本身的類型資訊。The interface allows an object to provide type information about itself. 一般而言，物件需要動態型別資訊時，會使用此介面。Typically, this interface is used when an object needs dynamic type information. 相反地，類別提供會從中繼資料取得的靜態類型資訊。In contrast, the class provides static type information that is obtained from metadata. 例如，用於[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]提供 COM 物件的型別資訊。For example, is used in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to provide type information for COM objects. COM 物件不支援屬性。COM objects do not support properties or attributes. 因此，[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]使用實作屬性和 COM 物件的屬性。Therefore, the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] uses to implement properties and attributes for COM objects. 若要提供動態的自訂型別資訊，一個類別可以實作或衍生自類別，可提供此介面的簡單實作。To provide dynamic custom type information, a class can implement or derive from the class, which provides a simple implementation of this interface. > [!NOTE] > 沒有設計階段支援的資料繫結至物件，可實作介面。There is no design-time support for data binding to objects that implement the interface. 此外，繫結至的執行階段執行個體時，基礎類型的公用屬性會被忽略。In addition, when binding to a runtime instance of , the public properties of the underlying type are ignored.

span.span: Type Descriptor Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection GetAttributes() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回元件之這個執行個體的自訂屬性集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of custom attributes for this instance of a component.
An containing the attributes for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的值絕不會是`null`。The return value is never `null`. 實作者可以傳回空如果沒有自訂屬性指定的物件。Implementers can return an empty if no custom attributes are specified for an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`null`會傳回使用中的型別名稱方法。If `null` is returned, use the type name from the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`null`會傳回此項目，使用預設名稱。If `null` is returned, use the default name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 型別`editorBaseType`參數則通常是，但您也可以使用其他類型 (例如和)。The type of the `editorBaseType` parameter is usually , but you can also use other types (for example, and ).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection GetEvents() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回這個元件執行個體的事件。

span.span: Returns the events for this instance of a component.

returns.span: ，代表此元件執行個體的事件。

span.span: An that represents the events for this component instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件類別提供一組可以不同於這個執行個體的事件。The events for this instance can differ from the set of events that the class provides. 例如，如果元件是站台為基礎，網站就可以新增或移除其他事件。For example, if the component is site-based, the site can add or remove additional events. 實作者可以傳回如果不指定了任何屬性。Implementors can return if no properties are specified. 這個方法永遠不應該傳回`null`。This method should never return `null`.

Public Function GetEvents (attributes As Attribute()) As EventDescriptorCollection

param.name: attributes
param.span: 類型陣列，可當做篩選條件使用。

span.span: An array of type that is used as a filter.

summary.span: 使用指定屬性陣列做為篩選條件傳回元件之執行個體的事件。

span.span: Returns the events for this instance of a component using the specified attribute array as a filter.

returns.span: ，代表此元件執行個體篩選過的事件。

span.span: An that represents the filtered events for this component instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件類別提供一組可以不同於這個執行個體的事件。The events for this instance can differ from the set of events that the class provides. 例如，如果元件是站台為基礎，網站就可以新增或移除其他事件。For example, if the component is site-based, the site can add or remove additional events. 如果中指定`attributes`陣列和事件沒有該屬性的類別的執行個體，如果傳回的陣列會包含事件是預設事件。If an is specified in the `attributes` array and the event does not have an instance of the class for that attribute, the returned array includes the event if the is the default event.

summary.span: 傳回元件之這個執行個體的屬性。

span.span: Returns the properties for this instance of a component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetProperties() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回元件之這個執行個體的屬性。

span.span: Returns the properties for this instance of a component.

returns.span: ，代表這個元件執行個體的屬性。

span.span: A that represents the properties for this component instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個執行個體的屬性可以與不同的類別所提供的屬性集。The properties for this instance can differ from the set of properties that the class provides. 比方說，如果元件決定位置，站台可以新增或移除其他屬性。For example, if the component is sited, the site can add or remove additional properties. 實作者可以傳回如果不指定了任何屬性。Implementers can return if no properties are specified. 這個方法永遠不應該傳回`null`。This method should never return `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個執行個體的屬性可以與不同的類別所提供的屬性集。The properties for this instance can differ from the set of properties that the class provides. 比方說，如果元件決定位置，站台可以新增或移除其他屬性。For example, if the component is sited, the site can add or remove additional properties. 如果中指定`attributes`陣列和屬性並沒有該屬性的類別的執行個體，則傳回的集合將包含屬性，如果是預設屬性。If an is specified in the `attributes` array and the property does not have an instance of the class for that attribute, the returned collection will include the property if the is the default property. 篩選規則，請參閱。For filtering rules, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetPropertyOwner(class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor pd) cil managed
Public Function GetPropertyOwner (pd As PropertyDescriptor) As Object

param.name: pd
param.span: ，代表要尋找其擁有者的屬性。

span.span: A that represents the property whose owner is to be found.

summary.span: 傳回物件，包含指定的屬性描述項所描述的屬性。

span.span: Returns an object that contains the property described by the specified property descriptor.
An that represents the owner of the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會擷取包含屬性成員所描述的物件參數。The method retrieves the object that contains the property member that is described by parameter. 一般而言，這個物件是為了和方法。Typically, this object is required for the and methods. 此方法應傳回，如下所示，您可以使用的物件：This method should return an object that you can use as follows: ``` pd.GetValue(GetPropertyOwner(myPd)); ``` 如果`myPd`已`null`，實作介面會傳回預設值的物件 （一般而言，基底物件所公開的屬性和屬性）。If `myPd` is `null`, your implementation of the interface should return the default object (typically, the base object that exposes the properties and attributes).
